text:
Hey, hey, Producer!
Look at this!

"I’m interested in the girl I saw when 283PRO was all together.
The yellow one from Illumine. I forgot her name…"

"I looked her up! Seems her name is Meguru Hachimiya.
She really suited that black-themed costume~"
"I might look forward to the next event."

Hehe,
well, it’s still "maybe" a new fan…!

Meguru’s hard work is connecting with people
like this. You can be happy about this one.
